LanguageData.ChjAndroidLike.label: android
LanguageData.ChjAndroidLike.description: This is an android made out of a different frame. Sometimes glitterworld inhabitants create androids that look like creatures from the myths, such as kijin & arachnes.
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_Hulking.description: Gives the Android an hulking and strong physique. The Android is now better at physically demanding tasks.\n-- "Hulk smash!"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_Hulking.label: hulking physique upgrade
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_Agile.label: agile physique upgrade
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_Agile.description: Gives the Android an thin and agile physique. The Android is now faster and better at dodging.\n-- "Orassan go nyoom!"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_Super.label: perfect physique upgrade
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_Super.description: Gives the Android an perfect physique. Bringing the best of both the agile and hulking phyisque together. The Android is now superior at everything physical.\n-- "I am now perfect."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_HyperweaveSkin.label: hyperweave skin upgrade
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_HyperweaveSkin.descrip: Gives the Android a skin made out of hyperweave supported by mechanites that help mend it. Grants increased resistances to physical damage.\n-- "The future is now."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_PlasteelSkin.label: plasteel skin upgrade
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_PlasteelSkin.descripti: Gives the Android a skin made out of plasteel supported by mechanites that help mend it. Grants greatly increased resistances to physical damage. Makes them less desirable socially though.\n-- "I'll be back."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_DragonScales.label: dragon scales upgrade
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_DragonScales.descripti: Augments the Androids skin with fantastical scales, and a network under the skin with a highly sophisticated cooling system that keeps the Android cool even under the most extreme high temperatures. Makes the Android nigh immune to fire and burn damage on top of increased armor.\n-- "Fuck you I'm a dragon."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_FighterModule.label: fighter module
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_FighterModule.descript: This module is utilized mostly by soldier Androids on glitterworlds. It enhances the combat capabilities of the user way beyond human limits.\n-- "The way of the warrior."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_MedicalModule.label: medical module
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_MedicalModule.descript: This module is designed for Androids who accompany glitterworld parties offworld. Contains the most cutting edge doctoring software and micro implants to help with first aid and surgery.\n-- "Hello nurse~"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_ConstructionModule.des: Designed for new colonies this module greatly help settlers to setup their new dwellings. Whether inside a mountain or atop a skyscraper this module helps.\n-- "Can we fix it?"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_CrafterModule.label: crafter module
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_CrafterModule.descript: Helps the Android to craft and cook much faster than their unupgraded kin. Used in premium crafter Android models in artisan workshops.\n-- "Mine and craft."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_AgriculturalModule.des: Outfitted with the latest plant and animal farming software this module with the help of a few menial laborers can run a farm on their own. Widely utilized by new glitterworld colonies.\n-- "Old MacDonald had a farm~"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_ScienceModule.label: science module
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_ScienceModule.descript: Augments the Androids reasoning and problem solving abilities beyond human comprehension. Installed on assistant laboratory Androids on glitterworlds all over the galaxy.\n-- "Big day today, Freeman."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_DiplomacyModule.label: diplomacy module
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_DiplomacyModule.descri: Gives the Android diplomatic and trading capabilities that seem supernatural. Widely installed on Androids who work on defusing hostage situations.\n-- "My name is Connor. Iâ€™m the android sent by CyberLife."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_VanometricCell.label: vanometric cell
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_VanometricCell.descrip: Miniature version of the Vanometric Powercell. When installed it frees the Android of the need for both energy and food. Truly the ultimate upgrade.\n-- "Power Overwhelming."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_MechaniteHive.label: mechanite hive
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_MechaniteHive.descript: Thumb sized devices placed throughout the body containing self maintaining factories of mechanites. Acts much like human blood when its exposed to the air and plugs any holes it detects.\n-- "I feel nothing!"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_BlackBox.label: black box
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_BlackBox.description: Usually installed in recon Androids which it is critical in that they do not get leave witnesses when critically wounded. Probably the ultimate retribution tool there is.\n-- "I'm taking you all with me!"
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_PsychicAttunement.desc: By utilizing a material which got the opposite effect of psychic foil so can the mind and body of the android become a attractor for psionic forces. Why you would want to do this without the presence of fantastical forces like Magic on the RimWorld is beyond many scientists.\n-- "I only need my mind to take you down."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_ArchotechAIModule.desc: Replaces the standard AI of the Android with a Archotech one. Considered dangerous by many this can be a boon though. With superior intellectual capabilities everything seem to come natural to the Android with this brain.\n-- "Ascension complete."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_TechprofAIModule.label: techprof module
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_TechprofAIModule.descr: Installs a secondary AI which greatly increases the research capabilities of the Android.\n-- "Two brains is better than one."
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_DroneCore.label: drone mentality
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_DroneCore.description: Is no better than a Droid mentally, but they get the benefits of an Android.
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_LoverCore.label: lover mentality
LanguageData.ChjAndroidUpgrade_LoverCore.description: Is a slave to love. Can change their target of obsession at will.
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidFaultySupport.label: faulty support
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidWornOut.label: worn out
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidWornOut.description: This part is slowly getting worn out. Not critical but will over a long time detoriate.
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidWornOut.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidWornOut.stages.2.label: major
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidWornOut.stages.3.label: severe
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidWornOut.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidFaultyLightSensor.label: faulty light sensor
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidFaultyLightSensor.descrip: The light sensors can't properly process light data.
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidCorruptMemory.label: corrupt memory
LanguageData.ChjAndroidDroidCorruptMemory.description: The working memory is corrupted. Will cause glitches if not amended.
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.label: coolant loss
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.description: This machine is bleeding out coolant. Fix the leaking before it overheat and explode!
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.stages.0.label: hidden
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.stages.2.label: moderate
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.stages.3.label: severe
LanguageData.ChjCoolantLoss.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.label: overheating
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.description: This machine is overheating critically! Immediatly fix before it explodes!
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.stages.0.label: hidden
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.stages.2.label: moderate
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.stages.3.label: severe
LanguageData.ChjOverheating.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.ChjPowerShortage.label: power shortage
LanguageData.ChjPowerShortage.description: This machine is now in power saving mode due to power shortage.
LanguageData.ChjPowerShortage.stages.0.label: extreme
LanguageData.ChjPowerFailure.label: power failure
LanguageData.ChjPowerFailure.description: This machine shut off permanently due to all power being gone. It would be futile to restart because the original personality is long gone.
